name: User attempts to share age verification attestation
scenarioId: ios/Age_verification_using_age_over_18_pseudonym_attestation_POC_16/AV_POC-Presenting_Age_Verification_attestation-remote_same_device_42/ageVerificationAttestationCrossDevice:User attempts to share age verification attestation
methodName: User attempts to share age verification attestation

testSteps.description: Given the user reads the age verification request
When the user taps the share button in the wallet app
Then the wallet app prompts the user to enter the PIN

userStory.narrative:
As a user of the EUDI Wallet
  I want to present my Age Verification Attestation to a requesting Relying Party on a different device
  So that I can prove that I am over 18 years old without revealing my age or any other personal information

title: User attempts to share age verification attestation
